item.title: UK Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer also thanked the first responders "who did a fantastic job last night and continue to do so” and said he is "being updated frequently" on the police investigation. #Liverpool #LFC #LiverpoolParade #KeirStarmer #UK #North
